metadata.title: Mollösunds Wärdshus | Luxury Hotel in Mollösund
metadata.description: Experience luxury and comfort at Mollösunds Wärdshus, a premier hotel destination in Mollösund with stunning ocean views and exceptional service.

about.title: About Our Hotel
about.description: Nestled in the charming coastal village of Mollösund, our hotel offers a perfect blend of traditional Swedish hospitality and modern luxury. With stunning views of the archipelago, comfortable accommodations, and exceptional dining, we provide an unforgettable experience for all our guests.

oceanView.title: Ocean Views
oceanView.description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Swedish archipelago from your room

dining.title: Fine Dining
dining.description: Experience exquisite local cuisine prepared by our award-winning chefs

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: Explore the beautiful surroundings with our curated activities and excursions

booking.title: Book Your Stay
booking.subtitle: Experience luxury and comfort at Mollösunds Wärdshus
booking.intro: Reserve your perfect getaway at Mollösunds Wärdshus. Our booking system allows you to check availability, compare room types, and secure your stay with instant confirmation.

standard.title: Standard Room
standard.description: Comfortable rooms with all essential amenities for a pleasant stay.

deluxe.title: Deluxe Room
deluxe.description: Spacious rooms with premium furnishings and partial sea views.

suite.title: Ocean Suite
suite.description: Luxurious suites with separate living areas and panoramic ocean views.

policies.title: Booking Policies
policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before arrival
policies.pets: Pet-friendly rooms available (additional fee may apply)

questions.question: Is breakfast included?
questions.answer: Yes, all room rates include our gourmet breakfast buffet.

questions.question: Do you offer airport transfers?
questions.answer: Yes, airport transfers can be arranged for an additional fee.

questions.question: Is there parking available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer complimentary parking for all guests.
